body:
Comment 1: 
But what if the memory has already been referenced by another value?  e.g.
http://play.golang.org/p/ZfY7naMOiq

You've probably already read it, but:  http://research.swtch.com/interfaces

Closing working as intended, but let us know if you have a concrete suggestion.
_Status changed to **WorkingAsIntended**._
